data.text:
@AlanGregg10 @AlexWynands1 Lots of people were forced to get a vaccine that they didn’t want. 

If they didn’t they would be fired (even though they were completely healthy and didn’t have Covid)

@sdkirton @SheenaPirlot @TheVotersSay And don't look now but 'deltacron' is coming and they'll 'say' it's much worse than any others preceding it!? Yeah, anyone over 120 years old or under 0 years old might, could die if the the stars align 'just' right!?
@TheVotersSay In Australia 83 people died of covid in 2 yrs, average age 83 and as unvaccinated with dual citizenship  I am still not allowed to leave this f communistic country. PRISON for unjabbed.

@AlexWynands1 @TheVotersSay There are lots of flus. The flu shot varies from year to year depending on which is the most aggressive. Also, take note that no one has been forced. We did it voluntarily in order to protect our fellow citizens. You know, the way societies work...
@MikeCoo81385264 @TheVotersSay I know, right?  Innumeracy is worse than illiteracy.
@AlanGregg10 @TheVotersSay The elderly are also more likely to suffer serious cases of the flu.  Can you explain why young people have never been forced to take the flu shot to protect them?
@TheVotersSay It's crazy when you look at the numbers with logic and not emotions. The only response is to shake your head at what we've done as a country over the last 2yrs.
@TheVotersSay We just learned that many of the deaths had COVID but did not die from covid
